src_original: kathaṃ ca bhagavan sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā?
tgt_original: 常啼菩薩摩訶薩云何求般若波羅蜜多？

src_original: evamukto bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat- sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena
mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena kāye 'narthikena jīvitanirapekṣeṇa  lābhasatkāraślokeṣvaniśritena paryeṣamāṇena paryeṣitā /
tgt_original: 「常啼菩薩摩訶薩本求般若波羅蜜多時，不惜身命，不顧珍財，不徇名譽，不希恭敬，而求般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: tena prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena araṇyagatena antarīkṣānnirghoṣaḥ śruto 'bhūt- gaccha kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi /  tatra prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasi /
tgt_original: 彼常樂居阿練若處，欻然聞有空中聲曰： 『咄！ 善男子！ 汝可東行，決定得聞甚深般若波羅蜜多。

src_original: tathā ca gaccha yathā na kāyaklamathamanasikāramutpādayasi,
tgt_original: 汝當行時，莫辭疲倦，莫念睡眠，莫思飲食，莫想晝夜，莫怖寒熱，於內外法心莫散亂。
